<!DOCTYPE html>
        <script src="//hangoutsapi.appspot.com/static/hangout.js"></script>
        <script src="//ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.6.4/jquery.min.js"></script>
      	<script>
		  var tabs = new gadgets.TabSet(__MODULE_ID__, "Two"); 
		  function init() {
		  	var participants = gapi.hangout.getParticipants();
			$.each(participants, function(index, value) {
			  var tabId = tabs.addTab(value.displayName);
			  console.log(value);
			  $(tabId).html(value);
			})
		  }
		  
		  gapi.hangout.addApiReadyListener(function(){
		    init()
		  });
	    </script>
